name: Aetherplume
instructions: Throw this in the air and up to 4 creatures of your choice fall slowly for 1 minute. Single use.

name: Alchemist's Supplies
instructions:
It's up to you to harvest materials you think have alchemical properties. The materials are consumed on success or failure.

***Learning Formulas (T0).*** You can either choose to create a formula you already know, or experiment with learning a new one. Make a medium difficulty check. On a success, you learn and brew a new formula.

***Craft potion or poison (T0).*** Takes 1 hour. If trained, no check is required.

name: Blind Fire Mark
disadvantageMsg: close your eyes and fire with disadvantage

name: Blood Hunter
instructions:
You practice the forbidden art of hemocraft to cast blood curses. Your ability for this is AGI.

***Pushing the limit.*** If you are out of wellspring, you can attempt to cast again. Make a check, DC + the feature's tier. On a failure, instantly drop to 0 AGI pool.

name: Crimson Chains
advantageMsg: all creatures have advantage to act against it while it is restrained

name: Cult Leader
instructions: Convince a person to make a pact with your patron and increase your max wellspring by 1

name: Hellish Rebuke
instructions:
while defending, deal 2 points, costs 1 wellspring

You point your finger, and the creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by the flames of Vortun.

name: Golem Familiar
notes:
summon a tier 0 tiny golem

Your patron lends one of their tiny minions to follow your commands and keep an eye on you. When their pool hits zero, they disappear back to your patron. It takes an hour to summon them again with an elaborate ritual. Work the DM to make them.

name: Hare Trigger
instructions: If the enemy side goes before you bullet time, you can roll an Agile check to take your turn before them. The target number based on the highest tier enemy.

name: Warlock of Vortun
instructions:
You draw magic from Vortun, the god of fire. He dreams of your experiences, and power flows through you. You use your Social score for Glomtili powers.

***Pushing the limit.*** If you are out of wellspring, you can attempt to cast again. Make a check with a target of 10 + the feature's level. On a failure, instantly drop to 0 Social pool.

***Waking the dragon.*** Displeasing Vortun disturbs his slumber, and blocks your ability to cast spells until he is calmed.

name: Hooded Lantern
instructions: Runs on flasks of lamp oil. Gives off light around it with a range of 1.

name: Jug of oil
instructions: lasts 48 hours in lamp or lantern

name: Kill it with fire
instructions: Getting the killing blow with fire pleases Vortun and soothes him in his slumber. Each person you kill with flame has a chance to unlock further power from Vortun, such as a new spell or feature.

name: Marks of the Thief
instructions:
If you rob a building that has been marked by the local thieves guild, and then gift a valuable stolen item to that guild, you earn the thieves' marks of that city.

Each guild will tattoo you with two marks, each of which provides a feature.

name: Mystic Pebble
instructions: deals 2 points, ranged when used with a sling

name: Needle of Mending
instructions: With this needle, you can repair a single break or tear in an object, as long as the break or tear is no larger than 1 foot in any dimension. It leaves no trace of the former damage.

name: Songwriter
instructions: Take 1 hour to write a song about a recent adventure. Select an effect from a list the DM provides. You must give the song a name.

name: Orb of Depths Direction
instructions: This item can orient you while traveling underground.

name: Shadowstep mark
instructions: as your move, teleport to a nearby zone, deal +1 on your next successful attack, costs 1 wellspring

name: Speaking Stone Carver
instructions: You can take an hour to carve a pair of speaking stones. All speaking stones are trinkets for you, but equipment for others.

multiRewards.name: Speaking Stones
multiRewards.instructions: Stones come in matching pairs, and are carved so they are easily distinguished. While you touch a stone, you can speak into it. The sound of your voice emits from the paired stone.

instructions: These gloves are invisible when worn. While wearing them, you roll with training and advantage when picking locks, picking pockets, or performing other acts of manipulating small objects for the purpose of stealing.

instructions: Grant a creature 3 inspiration. Each can be used whenever they choose to gain advantage on a  roll. A creature may only have 3 inspiration at a time and they expire on a full reset. Costs 1 wellspring. JULIAN: This needs a name

name: I Know a Guy
instructions: For any given objective, you might know a someone who can help. Roll a chance roll for one of the following specialties: Pickpocket (50%), Footpad or Fence (25%), Enforcer (10%), Informant (5%), Kingpin (1%). If you want to find another type of entrepreneur in the criminal arts, the DM will set the chance target. You can only roll once per objective.

name: Charm Person
instructions: Charm a creature who speaks your language. On a success, they regard you as a friendly acquaintance and you have advantage on social rolls with them. Ten minutes after the casting of the spell, they realize they were charmed and you have disadvantage. Costs 1 wellspring.
grantsAbilities: regard you as a friendly acquaintance

name: Enlarge / Reduce
advantageMsg: cause a creature to become  twice or half as big for one hour. They have advantage on actions when their new size is helpful

name: No-Stones
instructions:
see through walls, costs 1 wellspring

You can use an action to speak the command word, "unturned" and turn it over so the flat side is pressed against a natural surface. When you do, the geode is fixed in place and projects a map above it, showing the layout of the area around it with a range of 3. It shows all walls, floors, and surfaces made of stone, natural metal, or earth.

To remove the geode, speak the command word again.

instructions: Contains a hooded lantern, tinderbox, crowbar, climbing kit, and 50 ft of rope
